website_summaries.verdict: Level up arm strength and balance naturally with this highly-acclaimed training tool.
pros: A basic but effective product to build swinging speed during practice, drills, or on-deck warmups
Synthetic with a sturdy outer coating that stands up to impact
Fits bats ranging in barrel size from 2.25 inches to 2.62 inches
Donut design is unlikely to scratch wood composite bats
cons: Will not fit many softball bats or bats with non-tapered barrels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Durability
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight for my twin sons baseball bats. This thing is durable. During every game, it is dropped in the dirt, rolled in the dirt, thrown into the fence and my personal favorite...rolled all the way from home plate to the first base dug out. With all this, the thing looks brand new. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: THeins

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with the bat. Slides on and off quickly. It’s just the added weight my son needed as he warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a bat weight... It works well & the entire team uses it while on deck.
customer_reviews.author: Student Books

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner. Great product. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Ed

customer_reviews.title: Helps build swing power
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on all bats. Easy to install and remove. My son is hitting much more consistently after using it for about 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Works like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Helps with a good stretch of your muscles before you bat.
customer_reviews.author: AKC

customer_reviews.title: It's a bat weight that does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Really there isn't much to say other than it works perfectly. It's not too heavy of a weight to throw your swing off. It pops off easy and stays on when you want it to stay on. I use it before every at bat in men's softball.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great, but for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Great item, but unfortunately couldn't use for my 5 year old son. It was too heavy for him, and I have to return.
customer_reviews.author: BaseballMoM1983

customer_reviews.title: Needs better description.
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be for softball, but is more inline with a baseball bat weight. Needs better description.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina Jones

customer_reviews.title: Solid value and weight
customer_reviews.text: Goes great with our bat; very popular with the boys. Good weight for helping train them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Great bat weight
customer_reviews.text: Arrived nicely packaged. It is the perfect weight to place on my six year olds bat.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's just a bat weight. nothing too special about it. It just does it's job which is a simple one... Gives another pound of weight to your bat, that's all.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect donut weight
customer_reviews.text: Love this donut and is the perfect added weight to the bat!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Asencion Musgrove

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but red coating started to break and peel off within a month of use (3-4 times a week)
customer_reviews.author: Don C

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say but good price and fits softball bats
customer_reviews.text: Its a bat weight. Not much to say but good price and fits softball bats.
customer_reviews.author: Vol4Life

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old says this works very well and is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 16oz perfect for 13 year olds. Good quality, does what it's suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Super place to make a purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great place to buy from. I always use them for all my sports needs. nobody is faster nor more reliable!
customer_reviews.author: iwriteforhim

customer_reviews.title: Basic Bat Weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this weight because I bought a light bat to play softball with on my church's co-ed team. If you use it while you're on deck, then swing the bat without it, it makes a big difference. If you're using a heavy bat, and you warm up with the weight on it, it will feel lighter to you when you swing the bat without it. So, it has two uses. It fit on several different bats nicely without flying off. I know that is a concern with many people. In fact, they are outlawed in some little leages, so make sure to check that out first.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen N.

customer_reviews.title: he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: need to order another. My son loved this so much!! Someone apparently saw how much, and decided to see if they liked it just as much. Never to be found again after practice one day ::(
customer_reviews.author: jessica shipley

customer_reviews.title: It's a bat weight
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to screw this up, it's a weighted ring. Used six weeks without complaint. Holds when you want it to, slides right off when you don't. No issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: nomsDePlume

customer_reviews.title: Its a donut
customer_reviews.text: Its a donut. I think my son lost it all ready because I havent seen it since it came in.
customer_reviews.author: BLU BLA BLEE

customer_reviews.title: Standard Product
customer_reviews.text: It's what you want from a donut. Fits softball bats without slipping off and is a pretty decent weight for a guy.
customer_reviews.author: El Niño

customer_reviews.title: these are illegal to use if your league (house or ...
customer_reviews.text: these are illegal to use if your league (house or travel) plays to the Amateur Softball Association (ASA)/USA Softball rules due to injuries related to this design. Why this product would be available since it cannot be used is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit Softball Bat
customer_reviews.text: FYI - doesn't fit softball bat's non-tapered barrel. The weight sits just above hands and not where you want the weight which is the middle of the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: JB911

customer_reviews.title: more info needed
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a good product I think if it said that it only fit metal bats. I wanted to use it on my wooden baseball bat but didn't fit over the handle. So now I can't use it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my 12 year old wanted! Used it all season and will continue to use it in the future!
customer_reviews.author: NNW

customer_reviews.title: Bat Weight
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected. No bells and whistles with a bat weight.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old grandson picked this out and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: does its job
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is...so far it has held up well, despite heavy use by my son and his teammates.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gold

customer_reviews.title: hate it, it doesn't fit most of the bats
customer_reviews.text: Its too small and it doesn't fit the bat right. It fits towards the bottom and not the top. I don't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: rockahn

customer_reviews.title: Item exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Well what can you say, its round, has a hole, weighs 20oz and is yellow with a Demarini D on the side and it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Troy Tucker

product_meta.title: DeMarini Bat Weight
product_meta.description: Weight fits bats ranging in barrel size from 2 1/4" to 2 5/8"
feature_bullets: Use for training and building arm strength
Use when warming up to bat to build bat swing speed
Fits bats ranging in barrel size from 2 1/4" to 2 5/8"
